name: Bomirates
description:
Note: For mobile gaming:

On android (play store): 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Bomirates.Masnitani.Games

On ios:

(browser, not on the store yet)
https://s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/gd-games/game-0b683508-0f1b-4b1b-a93e-21aca78...

Our Island is in danger! A sky pirate is out there trying to invade the island to put his hand on the loot.

Your mission is to battle through the levels to save the native pirates keep their loot. You must click the pirates fast enough to evacuate them, just before the bomb hits the ground and explodes!

This journey provides:
✰ 45 Levels!
✰ An endless Classic mode!
✰ An endless Catch the Pirate mode!
✰ An endless Slice the Bomb mode!

The game is designed in a way to entertain players from all ages, so what are you waiting for? Let the FUN begins!
